name: Coca Cola
description: A popular carbonated cola soft drink.

name: Fanta
description: A fruit-flavored carbonated soft drink.

name: Sprite
description: A colorless, lemon and lime-flavored soft drink.

name: Pepsi
description: A carbonated soft drink manufactured by PepsiCo.

name: 7up
description: A brand of lemon-lime-flavored non-caffeinated soft drink.

name: Mountain Dew
description: A carbonated soft drink brand produced and owned by PepsiCo.

name: Dr Pepper
description: A carbonated soft drink created in the 1880s.

name: Ginger Ale
description: A ginger-flavored soft drink.

name: Iced Tea
description: A form of cold tea, usually served in a glass with ice.

name: Red Bull
description: An energy drink sold by Red Bull GmbH.

name: Gatorade
description: A non-carbonated sports drink manufactured by The Gatorade Company, Inc.

name: Coffee
description: A brewed drink prepared from roasted coffee beans.

name: Espresso
description: A full-flavored, concentrated form of coffee.

name: Cappuccino
description: A coffee drink that today is typically composed of double espresso and hot milk, with the surface topped with foamed milk.

name: Latte
description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: A heated drink consisting of shaved chocolate, melted chocolate or cocoa powder, heated milk or water, and sugar.

name: Milkshake
description: A cold beverage which is usually made from milk, ice cream, or iced milk, and flavorings or sweeteners such as butterscotch, caramel sauce, chocolate syrup, or fruit syrup.

name: Smoothie
description: A blended and sometimes sweetened beverage made from fresh fruit.

name: Mocha
description: Also known as mocaccino, is a chocolate-flavored variant of a caffè latte.

name: Green Tea
description: A type of tea that is made from Camellia sinensis leaves and buds that have not undergone the same withering and oxidation process used to make oolong teas and black teas.

name: Chai Latte
description: A flavored tea beverage made by brewing black tea with a mixture of aromatic herbs and spices.

name: Lemonade
description: A sweetened lemon-flavored beverage.

name: Yerba Mate
description: A traditional South American brew that’s been said to offer the “strength of coffee, the health benefits of tea, and the euphoria of chocolate”.

name: Water
description: A transparent, tasteless, odorless, and nearly colorless chemical substance, which is the main constituent of Earth's hydrosphere and the fluids of all known living organisms.

name: Coconut Water
description: The clear liquid inside coconuts (fruits of the coconut palm).

name: Orange Juice
description: A liquid extract of the orange tree fruit, produced by squeezing or reaming oranges.

name: Apple Juice
description: A fruit juice made by the maceration and pressing of an apple.

name: Grape Juice
description: A juice obtained from crushing and blending grapes into a liquid.

name: Pina Colada
description: A sweet cocktail made with rum, cream of coconut or coconut milk, and pineapple juice.

name: Mimosa
description: A cocktail composed of equal parts champagne (or other sparkling wine) and chilled citrus juice, usually orange juice.

name: Martini
description: A cocktail made with gin and vermouth, and garnished with an olive or a lemon twist.

name: Mojito
description: A traditional Cuban highball consisting of five ingredients: white rum, sugar, lime juice, soda water, and mint.

name: Tequila Sunrise
description: A cocktail made of tequila, orange juice, and grenadine syrup and served unmixed in a tall glass.

name: Margarita
description: A cocktail consisting of tequila, orange liqueur, and lime juice often served with salt on the rim of the glass.

name: Rum and Coke
description: A highball cocktail consisting of cola, rum, and often lime juice on ice.

name: White Russian
description: A cocktail made with vodka, coffee liqueur, and cream served with ice in an Old Fashioned glass.

name: Screwdriver
description: A simple but refreshing cocktail made by combining orange juice and vodka over ice.

name: Bloody Mary
description: A cocktail containing vodka, tomato juice, and combinations of other spices.

name: Manhattan
description: A cocktail made with whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters.

name: Tom Collins
description: A cocktail made from gin, lemon juice, sugar, and carbonated water.
